title: Morde funfact
body:
you can move drag anywhere on the map. Even from your in your own base, you can have it in enemy base.

I had it in the enemy base hitting their minions while enemies trying to find me, they were all like "wtf..." when ashe e found me sitting in my teams well

replies.body: Yeah, what you do is kill bot lane, grab dragon and make the drgaon ghost gank mid while you go bot and farm
what is... a drgaon? new monster?
